trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_SEQ_00<tab>Unlike certain other guilds, the Adventurers' Guild is a family-friendly organization, as you will prove with explosive flair. ※This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_SEQ_01<tab>Haermaga is inordinately proud of his take on traditional demon-slaying exhibitions, and would like you to man the cannons down in the Salt Strand. Seek out the Moonfire Faire chaperone Mayaru Moyaru down in lower La Noscea─you are sure to have a blast.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_SEQ_02<tab>Mayaru Moyaru insists on explaining some basic safety rules before he allows you near a cannon. As the representative of the guild, both masterful aim and noble conduct are expected of you. Speak with Mayaru Moyaru when you are ready to begin.
TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Mayaru Moyaru at the Salt Strand.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_HAERMAGA_000_000<tab>Hah, ready to churn it up? I named this event myself─named all of 'em, but the other two got shot down by other chaperones. But this one was a winner! I call it “The Cannon<var 1F /var>do Spirit”!

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_HAERMAGA_000_001<tab>Demon slaying's always a crowd pleaser, but parents of little ones can be a mite touchy about the hacking and slashing. What I figured is, you need to keep it <var 1A 02 /var>dry<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_HAERMAGA_000_002<tab>So we decided to use cannons instead. More civilized-like and crispy, was my way of thinking. That's why I sit in the big chair, I fancy. Family friendly, that's what I am.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_HAERMAGA_000_003<tab>Since when does the Adventurers' Guild have cannons? Weeell, I never could resist something complimentary, and the Maelstrom was─what do you call it?─<var 1A 02 /var>decommissioning<var 1A 01 /var> a few. They're safe enough. You've seen their like along the parapets of Aleport.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_HAERMAGA_000_004<tab>Since when does the Adventurers' Guild have cannons? Weeell, I never could resist something complimentary, and the Maelstrom was─what do you call it?─<var 1A 02 /var>decommissioning<var 1A 01 /var> a few. They're safe enough, this being an exhibition event and all.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_HAERMAGA_000_006<tab>The action's down in the Salt Strand, in lower La Noscea. The chaperone in charge is─hang my tongue, I'm ever muddling up Plainsfolk names─Mayaru Moyaru. He'll show you the ropes!

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_HAERMAGA_000_010<tab>You look like you could do with a little noisemaking! Go down to the Salt Strand and ask for the chaperone Mayaru Moyaru. Tell him you're to help with the Cannon<var 1F /var>do Spirit event!

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_HAERMAGA_000_011<tab>Someone who does all three events─now that's what I call an adventurer! Loves the trade, ready for a bit o' fun, never stingy with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> guild. An adventurer like that gets a special reward out of my own purse!

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_MAYARUMOYARU_000_030<tab>Ahoy, welcome to, um, the cannon event! I like to think of this as an exhibition that packs a real punch. And also family friendly─look at all the little ones in the audience!

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_MAYARUMOYARU_000_031<tab>The chief chaperone told you what you'd be up to, yes? Demon slaying, and lots of it! We've acquired some nice 18-ponze cannons. They make a big bang when they're fired at their targets─sabotenders and womandragoras in this case!
TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_MAYARUMOYARU_000_032<tab>And don't go hitting anything other than your intended targets! I think it's been mentioned once or twice that this is a family-friendly event.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_MAYARUMOYARU_000_033<tab>I mean...it's not as though someone would <var 1A 02 /var>die<var 1A 01 /var> or anything if one were to accidentally get a blast to the face. But a cannonball is still far from a flan puff. I shouldn't think it would be safe.

TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_MAYARUMOYARU_000_034<tab>Besides, it would be in extremely poor taste to shoot any future adventurers with the cannon. We can't have them thinking ill of the guild. And it <var 1A 02 /var>certainly<var 1A 01 /var> wouldn't be family friendly!
TEXT_FESSUM005_01538_MAYARUMOYARU_000_035<tab>Now, please think on everything I've said. If you decide you'd like to play by the rules, simply speak with me to participate.
